title: Bg. 1.7
sanskrit: अस्माकं तु विशिष्टा ये तान्निबोध द्विजोत्तम ।नायका मम सैन्यस्य संज्ञार्थ तान्ब्रवीमि ते ॥ ७ ॥
transliteration: asmākaṁ tu viśiṣṭā yetān nibodha dvijottamanāyakā mama sainyasyasaṁjñārthaṁ tān bravīmi te

words_trans.nibodha: just take note of, be informed

literary_trans: But for your information, O best of the brāhmaṇas, let me tell you about the captains who are especially qualified to lead my military force.But for your information, O best of the brāhmaṇas, let me tell you about the captains who are especially qualified to lead my military force.
